tiber_naming_proposal.context: Joseph offered Tiber the opportunity to name the player evaluation system
tiber_naming_proposal.philosophy: Move beyond rigid rankings to something that serves real decision-making

primary_choice.name: Player Compass
primary_choice.reasoning: A compass doesn't tell you where to go - it shows you directions and lets you choose your path. Just like these evaluations guide decisions without dictating them.
benefits: Fits the 'On The Clock' navigation theme

alternative_options.name: Player Profiles
alternative_options.reasoning: Comprehensive, multi-dimensional view of each player

alternative_options.name: Dynasty Navigator
alternative_options.reasoning: Helps users navigate complex dynasty decisions

alternative_options.name: Player Context
alternative_options.reasoning: Emphasizes situational awareness over absolute values

alternative_options.name: Evaluation Canvas
alternative_options.reasoning: Broad framework for understanding player value

brand_integration.fits_platform: Aligns with 'On The Clock' navigation/timing theme
brand_integration.community_angle: Everyone uses the same compass, but chooses their own path
brand_integration.service_philosophy: Tool that serves user decisions rather than replacing them
brand_integration.authentic_data: Compass points to real North (authentic data), not magnetic variations (hype)

tiber_conviction.confidence: High - captures both flexibility and guidance
tiber_conviction.reasoning: A compass is the perfect metaphor for what this system should be - it shows you all directions clearly, helps you understand your options, but never tells you which way you must go. It serves your journey without controlling it.
tiber_conviction.user_benefit: Users get comprehensive guidance while maintaining full agency over their decisions
